duties_responsibilities.duty: Initiate, control, and oversee HC Technology business transformation and upgrade initiatives.
Lead major HC systems projects, process design, and HC systems configuration.
Work with HC, IT, and business sponsors to determine and coordinate the project lifecycle, create project scope, estimate costs, define project schedule, and assign tasks.
Evaluate business scope/objectives, assess impacts, and develop cost-effective solutions in collaboration with IT.
Manage multiple projects, link projects to business initiatives, ensure adherence to project management standards, and assume ultimate responsibility for project success.
Consult with Project Sponsors, develop business requirements documents, project charters, work breakdown structures, project schedules, and risk management plans.
Coordinate and facilitate project team meetings, gather status input, escalate issues, and maintain project documentation for future reference and audit requirements.
Facilitate post-implementation reviews, lessons learned exercises, and project closure activities.
Provide PeopleSoft HCM subject matter expertise, critique business process and system enhancements, and provide input on department goals and objectives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, Computer Science, or a related field. In lieu of a Bachelor’s Degree, four (4) years of managing projects and HR Technology implementations experience.
